title: What is the law on U-Turns - specifically who must yield?  When making a right on  Eastwood out of Autumn Hall (a small road) do the  u-turn people on Eastwood have right-of-way since it is a larger road?
text:
Cars at a stop sign must yield, even to U-turners.

http://www.myreporter.com/2012/10/who-yields-when-u-turners-turn-in-front-of-someone-at-a-stop-sign/
